thread.section_title: Euro Car Parts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Euro Car Parts | www.eurocarparts.com | 3 of 75
thread.title: Guanhua
thread.title_full: Euro Car Parts reviewed by Guanhua

author: Guanhua
title: Guanhua
text:
I always buy parts from Euro Car Parts. The free delivery is very good. And
the 365 days return policy is even better. Today I used online chat to return an item which is no longer required. Natasha (reference 373194) kindly generated an return number for me without problem. It is a top service I received. I will definitely use Euro Car Parts again.
Guanhua
